: : Razor : :
Razor leads the rest of the group to the holding area.
Razor: Put the prisoner in that cell.
: : Wolfenstein : :
Wolfenstein pushes Phoenix into the cell. He is still worried about what they will do to her though. He doesn't care about the branding, that is physical and can be repaired. He is worried about some of the liberties the boys may take on her.
Wolfenstein: I saw the CR room. I'll go take care of the insignia and paint job now. Dont start the party without me. C'mon Skulletron.
Wolfenstein goes to the CR room and gets in a chamber. The CR chamber begins it's work.
: : Diesel : :
Diesel activates the forcefield on the cell so Phoenix cant escape.
Diesel: Hurry up with that branding torch, Hollywood.
: : Heartbreak : :
HBK hadn't taken his eyes off of the captured femme bot. On Cybertron his fame had brought him many femme's but it was always more fun with the unwilling. He hoped they would hurt this cute Predacon alot.
OOC: Wow I'm making these guys sick and twisted.
The preceding has been paid for by the
New World Order
 Hollywood Narrator <hollywood.narrator@...> wrote:OOC: Well, that's because I want to be serious. The characters you seen upon my initial return were meant as jokes and those are the ones you criticized. Spider is meant to be serious and Deemos and Arrow are two of my classic characters that in my opinion were big hits. I've actually been in this RPG for the last 3 years, although I've had two large absences in there somewhere where I didn't post for a couple of months. I just like being down on myself, even when I do like my posts. I attribute this to the fact that my posts in NBW have become few and rare. Thanks for your compliment, though... ----- Original Message -----From: ">cardhead649 <cardhead649@...>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.comSent: Sunday, February 02, 2003 7:37 AMSubject: Re: nWo base
OOC: Nothing wrong with this post.  It's a lot better than some of 
the posts I've seen on this PBeM.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Hollywood Narrator" 
<hollywood.narrator@v...> wrote:
> OOC: My pathetic post. Don't mind me, I just wanted to show I'm 
alive.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Deemos approaches and watches silently, somehow looking both proud 
and upset simultaneously. The reason for this was unknown, but Deemos 
had always been a disturbed robot anyway. Spider walks up and appears 
very excited. Arrow is nowhere in sight.
> 
> Spider: I just hope I can be great enough one day for this team. As 
great as I am, that task may be impossible.
> 
> Deemos: I sacrificed my honor and became a traitor, and there was 
no turning back. I paid my dues through hard work and became a leader 
of a small ill fated faction and I'm still not great. I don't think 
you know what greatness is.
> 
> His sight never strayed from Phoenix while speaking to Spider.
> 
> Spider: Yeah... Yeah.
> 
> The furious Spider tries to pretend Deemos doesn't exist for a 
moment. He tries to hide his resentment of what Deemos said, but is 
unable. He appears really immature, but he was a young bot and very 
arrogant...
> 
>   ----- Original Message -----
>   From: cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>   Sent: Sunday, February 02, 2003 7:14 AM
>   Subject: Re: nWo base
> 
> 
>   Phoenix::
> 
>   The femme shudders, but doesn't try to escape, knowing she can't 
>   overpower Wolfenstein.  She's been on the wrong end of several 
forms 
>   of 'entertainment' involving female prisoners, and being branded 
is 
>   the least of her fears at the moment.
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
>   > 
>   > : : Razor : : 
>   > Razor: We welcome all to the New World Order. You will have to 
>   change you color scheme and faction insignia's. Then we can all 
share 
>   a few drinks. 
>   > Razor's attention moves to the femme, causing him to smile. 
>   > Razor: And we need to secure the prisoner. I'm sure that we can 
>   find ways to entertain ourselves with her around. Come on in. 
>   > He turns to walk back into the base with the nWo following. He 
>   turns to Hollywood. 
>   > Razor: Get the branding torch, it's time.... 
>   > The preceding has been paid for by the 
>   > New World Order 
>   >  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote: 
>   Phoenix::
>   > 
>   > Join them.  It seems so easy, and yet, something holds Phoenix 
>   back - 
>   > Flicker.  Every time she thinks of him, she remembers what she 
and 
>   so 
>   > many others owe him.  Phoenix realizes she can't betray the 
>   > Predacons, if only for the debt she owes that one Pred.
>   > 
>   > The femme remains silent, waiting for a response from these 
>   > mysterious black-and-white bots.
>   > 
>   > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
>   wrote:
>   > > 
>   > > : : Wolfenstein : : 
>   > > Wolfenstein smiles at how easily the Predacon femme had 
>   > surrendered. However he wasn't completely happy with himself. 
He 
>   > could show ruthless aggression if necissary but he was a 
honorable 
>   > warrior. This femme seemed so innocent, he almost felt bad 
about 
>   > doing this too her. 
>   > > He losens his grip around her neck a bit, so she wont be 
choked, 
>   > but still keeping a good hold on her. 
>   > > Wolfenstein(in a whisper to Phoenix): Dont try to fight out 
of 
>   the 
>   > situation. I honestly dont want to hurt you. Just go along with 
it, 
>   > maybe even join us. 
>   > > Wolfenstein(to all): So what about it? Will you let us join 
the 
>   > brotherhood? 
>   > >  "cardhead649 <cardhead649@y...>" <cardhead649@y...> wrote: 
>   > Phoenix::
>   > > 
>   > > The femme was already scared; Skulletron's and Wolfenstein's 
>   > actions 
>   > > don't help any.  For all the hell she went through at the 
hands 
>   of 
>   > > the Rogues, she is still innocent in many ways, and betrayal 
is 
>   an 
>   > > alien concept to her.  Knowing little about Hydras or 
Megatron, 
>   she 
>   > > is unaffected by Skulletron's arguement.  However, she knows 
>   she's 
>   > in 
>   > > a tight squeeze.
>   > > 
>   > > "Flicker ..." she whispers so low even Wolfenstein would 
barely 
>   be 
>   > > able to hear her.  "What would you do?"  Somewhere in the 
back of 
>   > her 
>   > > mind, a memory thought long deleted comes to the surface.  
She 
>   sees 
>   > > once again the horror of the Rogues' attack on the 
defenseless 
>   > > convent she had once called home.  She sees Flicker stand up 
to 
>   > them, 
>   > > despite being hopelessly overmatched.  In desperation, she 
had 
>   > > surrendered herself to protect him and her people.  Now, it 
seems 
>   > to 
>   > > her to be the only route open once again.  
>   > > 
>   > > "I ... I surrender ..." she says aloud, her voice choked from 
>   more 
>   > > than just the wolf-bot's arm.
>   > > 
>   > > OOC: Do what you will, just don't try to kill her - she has a 
>   > mutant 
>   > > spark that can't be destroyed.
>   > >

<roborick007@y...>

point.

message

agree 
>   with

>   > > > Wolf deactivates his comm unit and draws his plasma rifle 
on

behind, 
>   > > holding the gun to her head.

>   Predacons! 
>   > > > OOC: If my modeing on Phoenix isn't excepted then I'll 
change 
>   the 
>   > > post.

>   > Skulletron

face

his 
>   gun 
>   > > aimed at the nWo side, but slowly spins around, aiming at 
>   > Wolfenstein 
>   > > and Pheonix.  He takes a step back. Skulletron:  Come on 
Wolf, 
>   join 
>   > > me!  You know it as well as I do, this is inevitable!  Can't 
you 
>   > see 
>   > > that Hydras has smeered the Predacon legacy and is just using 
us

be

I 
>   > > admit, I am a bit headstrong when it comes to facing up to 
>   enemies, 
>   > > but I came with secret intentions, my own agenda. Skulletron 
>   > > struggles with words and thoughts.  He has to come up with

>   > > fast, and won't have time to think about the effects...-----

holding

>   stands

then

I 
>   > have 
>   > > a bargain! He shouts out loudly.  He stops and holds his hand 
out 
>   > to 
>   > > the nWo defenders, gesturing to hold on for a second. 
>   Skulletron:  
>   > > Please, get your leader, I can assure you that I won't waste 
your 
>   > > time!

<P align=center><STRONG><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" color=#ff4040>: : Razor : :</FONT></STRONG>
<P align=center><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" color=#ff4040>Razor leads the rest of the group to the holding area.</FONT>
<P align=center><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"><FONT color=#ff4040><STRONG>Razor: </STRONG>Put the prisoner in that cell.</FONT></FONT>
<P align=center><STRONG>: : Wolfenstein : :</STRONG>
<P align=center>Wolfenstein pushes Phoenix into the cell. He is still worried about what they will do to her though. He doesn't care about the branding, that is physical and can be repaired. He is worried about some of the liberties the boys may take on her.
<P align=center><STRONG>Wolfenstein: </STRONG>I saw the CR room. I'll go take care of the insignia and paint job now. Dont start the party without me. C'mon Skulletron.
<P align=center>Wolfenstein goes to the CR room and gets in a chamber. The CR chamber begins it's work.
<P align=center><STRONG><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" color=#ff4040>: : Diesel : :</FONT></STRONG>
<P align=center><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" color=#ff4040>Diesel activates the forcefield on the cell so Phoenix cant escape.</FONT>
<P align=center><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"><FONT color=#ff4040><STRONG>Diesel: </STRONG>Hurry up with that branding torch, Hollywood.</FONT></FONT>
<P align=center><STRONG><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" color=#ff4040>: : Heartbreak : :</FONT></STRONG>
<P align=center><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" color=#ff4040>HBK hadn't taken his eyes off of the captured femme bot. On Cybertron his fame had brought him many femme's but it was always more fun with the unwilling. He hoped they would hurt this cute Predacon alot.</FONT>
<P align=center><STRONG>OOC: </STRONG>Wow I'm making these guys sick and twisted.
<P align=center><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" color=#ff4040>The preceding has been paid for by the</FONT>
<P align=center><STRONG><FONT style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" color=#ff4040>New World Order</FONT></STRONG>

<DIV><FONT size=2>OOC: Well, that's because I want to be serious. The characters you seen upon my initial return were meant as jokes and those are the ones you criticized. Spider is meant to be serious and Deemos and Arrow are two of my classic characters that in my opinion were big hits. I've actually been in this RPG for the last 3 years, although I've had two large absences in there somewhere where I didn't post for a couple of months.</FONT></DIV>
<DIV><FONT size=2></FONT> </DIV>
<DIV><FONT size=2>I just like being down on myself, even when I do like my posts. I attribute this to the fact that my posts in NBW have become few and rare. Thanks for your compliment, though...</FONT></DIV>
